downloadTitle: Equipment Maintenance in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: ​This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the Equipment Maintenance module in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.​
detailsSection:
Audience This training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the Equipment Maintenance module in Microsoft Dynamics SL. At Training Material Completion After reviewing this training, individuals will have:
  • Understand the Equipment Maintenance module, including the flow of transactions through the module and interaction with other modules.
  • Become familiar with the Equipment Maintenance screens and reports.
  • Understand the implementation strategies and tools and the module's strengths
Prerequisites Before reviewing this training, it is recommended that individuals have:
  • Knowledge of basic navigation functions in Microsoft Dynamics SL.
  • Completion of any of the following: Service Contracts or Service Dispatch training course.
